workExperience.title: Software Engineering Intern
workExperience.roledesc: Built and maintained key features for Tesla's internal application for vehicle insurance. Worked closely with cross-functional teams including developers, designers, and product managers to ship end-to-end digital products.

workExperience.title: Software Designer
workExperience.roledesc: Solved bugs and optimized the dashboard layout while working with multiple teams and the vehicle driver. Implemented additional functionalities on dashboard boot-up and streamlined communication between systems, ensuring efficient control during real-time operations.
